Additional Notes:   On January 14, 2004, Terje 'Valfar' Bakken went
=================   out on a walk towards his family's cabin at
                    Fagereggi, but he never arrived. Three days
                    later, authorities found his body at ReppastÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¸len 
                    in the Sogndal valley. He had gotten stuck 
                    in a snow storm, and had died of hypothermia.

                    The band performed a last concert in Oslo on 
                    September 3rd in 2004 in honor of Valfar. 
                    Enslaved (Nor), Finntroll and Mindgrinder 
                    were the guest bands.

                    'Windir' is a word in the SognamÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¥l Norwegian 
                    dialect, translating to 'Warrior'.
